title: The Iron Ball of Liberation
data:
| 0   The Iron Ball of Liberation   *(No tile)* |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| --------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                                     | [heavy iron ball](/wiki/Heavy_iron_ball "Heavy iron ball")                                                                                                                                                                        |
|                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| Affiliation                                   | - [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral")
- [Convict](/wiki/Convict "Convict")
- [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent_artifacts "Intelligent artifacts")                                                                                    |
|                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| When carried                                  | * [warning](/wiki/Warning "Warning")
* [displacement](/wiki/Displacement "Displacement")
* [automatic searching](/wiki/Automatic_searching "Automatic searching")
* [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") |
| When used                                     | *(none)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| When invoked                                  | - [phasing](/wiki/Phasing "Phasing")                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| Base price                                    | 5000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| Weight                                        | [300](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                                                                                      |

**The Iron Ball of Liberation** is the [Convict](/wiki/Convict "Convict") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") in [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), [DynaHack](/wiki/DynaHack "DynaHack"), [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). It is the prize for completing the [Convict quest](/wiki/Convict_quest "Convict quest"), and is [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral") for [wishing](/wiki/Wish "Wish") purposes. Its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") type is a [heavy iron ball](/wiki/Heavy_iron_ball "Heavy iron ball") that is hard-coded to weigh 300 [aum](/wiki/Aum "Aum").

## Description

While carried, the Iron Ball of Liberation confers [warning](/wiki/Warning "Warning"), [displacement](/wiki/Displacement "Displacement"), [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance"), and [automatic searching](/wiki/Automatic_searching "Automatic searching"). When [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke"), the Iron Ball [chains itself to you](/wiki/Punishment "Punishment") and confers temporary [phasing](/wiki/Phasing "Phasing"). A Convict touching the Ball will [erodeproof](/wiki/Erosion "Erosion") it and set its weight back to 300.

Like all other iron balls, a [scroll of punishment](/wiki/Scroll_of_punishment "Scroll of punishment") may increase the Iron Ball of Liberation's weight.

## Strategy

The major problem with this artifact is obvious: it is extremely heavy. The weight is so much of an issue that many choose to abandon the ball and use other means for acquiring the benefits.

If you decide to carry the Iron Ball of Liberation, there are some very interesting uses.

- It makes a very decent one-handed weapon. If you are using a shield (for reflection probably) instead of [two-weaponing](/wiki/Two-weaponing "Two-weaponing") it does more damage than an unenchanted [Luckblade](/wiki/Luckblade "Luckblade"). Convicts most likely already have at least basic skill in flail, meaning that it can be wielded and used effectively immediately.

* Once you get beyond unskilled at flail, throwing the ball pulls you several spaces. The higher your skill, the further you go. This can be very convenient when trying to get over traps in your way. But be careful when crossing water!

- When chained to you, the Iron Ball of Liberation can be thrown and then retrieved by backing up. This is very useful against [sessile](/wiki/Sessile "Sessile") monsters (like [blue jellies](/wiki/Blue_jellies "Blue jellies")).

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

The Iron Ball of Liberation

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
0   The Iron Ball of Liberation   (No tile)
Base item heavy iron ball
Affiliation
  • neutral
  • Convict
  • intelligent
When carried
  • warning
  • displacement
  • automatic searching
  • magic resistance
When used (none)
When invoked
  • phasing
Base price 5000 zm
Weight 300

The Iron Ball of Liberation is the Convict quest artifact in UnNetHack, DynaHack, SpliceHack and SlashTHEM. It is the prize for completing the Convict quest, and is neutral for wishing purposes. Its base item type is a heavy iron ball that is hard-coded to weigh 300 aum.

Description

While carried, the Iron Ball of Liberation confers warning, displacement, magic resistance, and automatic searching. When invoked, the Iron Ball chains itself to you and confers temporary phasing. A Convict touching the Ball will erodeproof it and set its weight back to 300.

Like all other iron balls, a scroll of punishment may increase the Iron Ball of Liberation's weight.

Strategy

The major problem with this artifact is obvious: it is extremely heavy. The weight is so much of an issue that many choose to abandon the ball and use other means for acquiring the benefits.

If you decide to carry the Iron Ball of Liberation, there are some very interesting uses.

  • It makes a very decent one-handed weapon. If you are using a shield (for reflection probably) instead of two-weaponing it does more damage than an unenchanted Luckblade. Convicts most likely already have at least basic skill in flail, meaning that it can be wielded and used effectively immediately.
  • Once you get beyond unskilled at flail, throwing the ball pulls you several spaces. The higher your skill, the further you go. This can be very convenient when trying to get over traps in your way. But be careful when crossing water!
  • When chained to you, the Iron Ball of Liberation can be thrown and then retrieved by backing up. This is very useful against sessile monsters (like blue jellies).
